name: KACHINA
description:
KACHINA is a shooter where you choose a deck of weapons but it is the dice that decides which one you are going to occupy. 

Carefully choose your weapons, add to and remove from your deck, and hit the number of the die you want to use a certain weapon from your deck.

Immerse yourself in this platformer full of shots, try all types of weapons, create your decks and learn how to use the dice.

VIDEOGAME CREATED BY YANFER

ALL OF THE MUSIC FEATURED ON THIS VIDEOGAME IS ORIGINALLY COMPOSED BY DEREK FIECHTER AND BRANDON FIECHTER

FOLLOW THEM IN YOUTUBE:

Fantasy & World Music by the Fiechters - YouTube
